name: sinricpro-website
description: This repository contains the Sinric Pro website http://sinric.pro code

scripts.build: mustache i18n/translation.en.json index.mustache > public/-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.es.json index.mustache > public/-es-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.de.json index.mustache > public/-de-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.it.json index.mustache > public/-it-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.de.json index.mustache > public/-de-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.hi.json index.mustache > public/-hi-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.th.json index.mustache > public/-th-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.si.json index.mustache > public/-si-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.kan.json index.mustache > public/-kan-index.html & mustache i18n/translation.pt.json index.mustache > public/-pt-index.html
scripts.minify: htmlminify -o public/index.html public/-index.html & htmlminify -o public/es-index.html  public/-es-index.html & htmlminify -o public/es-index.html  public/-es-index.html & htmlminify -o public/de-index.html  public/-de-index.html  & htmlminify -o public/it-index.html  public/-it-index.html & htmlminify -o public/hi-index.html  public/-hi-index.html & htmlminify -o public/th-index.html  public/-th-index.html & htmlminify -o public/si-index.html  public/-si-index.html & htmlminify -o public/kan-index.html  public/-kan-index.html & htmlminify -o public/pt-index.html  public/-pt-index.html
